ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: If I should find myself in a jam, I could think of many ways to get out of it.
Notes: 1= Definitely False; 2= Mostly False; 3= Somewhat False; 4= Slightly False; 5= Slightly True; 6= Somewhat True; 7= Mostly True; 8= Definitely True

ElementDescription: At the present time, I am energetically pursuing my goals.
Notes: 1= Definitely False; 2= Mostly False; 3= Somewhat False; 4= Slightly False; 5= Slightly True; 6= Somewhat True; 7= Mostly True; 8= Definitely True

ElementDescription: There are lots of ways around any problem that I am facing now.
Notes: 1= Definitely False; 2= Mostly False; 3= Somewhat False; 4= Slightly False; 5= Slightly True; 6= Somewhat True; 7= Mostly True; 8= Definitely True

ElementDescription: Right now I see myself as being pretty successful.
Notes: 1= Definitely False; 2= Mostly False; 3= Somewhat False; 4= Slightly False; 5= Slightly True; 6= Somewhat True; 7= Mostly True; 8= Definitely True

ElementDescription: I can think of many ways to reach my current goals.
Notes: 1= Definitely False; 2= Mostly False; 3= Somewhat False; 4= Slightly False; 5= Slightly True; 6= Somewhat True; 7= Mostly True; 8= Definitely True

ElementDescription: At this time, I am meeting the goals that I have set for myself.
Notes: 1= Definitely False; 2= Mostly False; 3= Somewhat False; 4= Slightly False; 5= Slightly True; 6= Somewhat True; 7= Mostly True; 8= Definitely True
